attributes.action: change the olympic logo to one picked by the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pink olympic logo has gone down like a lead balloon - you shouldn't need it explaining to you what it says.  I propose that country-wide competition is held to come up with a better one and the best ones put forward for a public phone in to vote for the people's favourite.  Proceeds of which should go to pay olympic bill.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
